import React, { Component } from "react"; import * as hoadonAPI from "../../apis/billing"; import BillItem from "./BillItem"; import ImportItem from "./ImportItem"; import "./style.css"; import AddBill from "./AddBill"; import AddNote from "./AddNote"; export default class index extends Component { state = { processingBilling: [], importBilling: [], modal :0 }; showModal =(index)=>{ this.setState({modal:index}); } hideModal =()=>{ this.setState({modal:0}); } async componentDidMount() { let processingBilling = []; let importBilling = []; await hoadonAPI .processingBilling() .then((success) => { processingBilling = success.data.value.$values; }) .catch((error) => {}); await hoadonAPI .importBilling() .then((success) => { importBilling = success.data.value.$values; }) .catch((error) => {}); this.setState({ processingBilling: processingBilling, importBilling: importBilling, }); } render() { return (
<> { (()=>{ if (this.state.modal==1) return ({this.componentDidMount()}}>); else if (this.state.modal==2) return ({this.componentDidMount()}}>); }).bind(this)()}
